price: (Rabbiin) “Yaa Ibliis! Maaliif warra sujuuda bu’an wajji ta’uu didde?” jedheen.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
